mapper.sql: PB.f_id,PB.f_short_code,PB.f_amount,date_format(PB.f_month,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_month,date_format(PB.f_bill_month,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_bill_month,PB.f_is_pay,date_format(PB.f_pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_pay_time,PB.f_finance_status,PB.f_dedu_price,PB.f_payment_way,PB.t_real_room_f_id,PB.f_property_proprietor_id,PB.f_succ_pay_amount,PB.f_discount,PB.f_prize_record_id,date_format(PB.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_sys0_upd_time,PB.f_bill_time_cfg_id,PB.f_bill_type_id,PB.f_bill_type_name,PB.f_is_prop_fee,PB.f_paytime_type,PB.f_cycle_type,PB.f_bill_month_size,date_format(PB.f_bill_month_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_bill_month_start,date_format(PB.f_bill_month_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_bill_month_end,date_format(PB.f_pay_day_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_pay_day_start,date_format(PB.f_pay_day_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_pay_day_end,PB.f_hb_amount,PB.f_prefer_type,PB.t_bill_cycle_id,PB.t_group_building_bill_cycle_config_f_id,PB.f_cash_status,PB.t_realroom_software_fee_f_id,PB.f_last_unpaid,PB.f_bank_collection_status

PB.f_id as PBid,PB.f_short_code as PBshortCode,PB.f_amount as PBamount,date_format(PB.f_month,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBmonth,date_format(PB.f_bill_month,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBbillMonth,PB.f_is_pay as PBisPay,date_format(PB.f_pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBpayTime,PB.f_finance_status as PBfinanceStatus,PB.f_dedu_price as PBdeduPrice,PB.f_payment_way as PBpaymentWay,PB.t_real_room_f_id as PBtRealRoomFId,PB.f_property_proprietor_id as PBpropertyProprietorId,PB.f_succ_pay_amount as PBsuccPayAmount,PB.f_discount as PBdiscount,PB.f_prize_record_id as PBprizeRecordId,date_format(PB.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBsys0UpdTime,PB.f_bill_time_cfg_id as PBbillTimeCfgId,PB.f_bill_type_id as PBbillTypeId,PB.f_bill_type_name as PBbillTypeName,PB.f_is_prop_fee as PBisPropFee,PB.f_paytime_type as PBpaytimeType,PB.f_cycle_type as PBcycleType,PB.f_bill_month_size as PBbillMonthSize,date_format(PB.f_bill_month_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBbillMonthStart,date_format(PB.f_bill_month_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBbillMonthEnd,date_format(PB.f_pay_day_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBpayDayStart,date_format(PB.f_pay_day_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PBpayDayEnd,PB.f_hb_amount as PBhbAmount,PB.f_prefer_type as PBpreferType,PB.t_bill_cycle_id as PBtBillCycleId,PB.t_group_building_bill_cycle_config_f_id as PBtGroupBuildingBillCycleConfigFId,PB.f_cash_status as PBcashStatus,PB.t_realroom_software_fee_f_id as PBtRealroomSoftwareFeeFId,PB.f_last_unpaid as PBlastUnpaid,PB.f_bank_collection_status as PBbankCollectionStatus

PB1.f_id as PB1id,PB1.f_short_code as PB1shortCode,PB1.f_amount as PB1amount,date_format(PB1.f_month,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1month,date_format(PB1.f_bill_month,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1billMonth,PB1.f_is_pay as PB1isPay,date_format(PB1.f_pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1payTime,PB1.f_finance_status as PB1financeStatus,PB1.f_dedu_price as PB1deduPrice,PB1.f_payment_way as PB1paymentWay,PB1.t_real_room_f_id as PB1tRealRoomFId,PB1.f_property_proprietor_id as PB1propertyProprietorId,PB1.f_succ_pay_amount as PB1succPayAmount,PB1.f_discount as PB1discount,PB1.f_prize_record_id as PB1prizeRecordId,date_format(PB1.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1sys0UpdTime,PB1.f_bill_time_cfg_id as PB1billTimeCfgId,PB1.f_bill_type_id as PB1billTypeId,PB1.f_bill_type_name as PB1billTypeName,PB1.f_is_prop_fee as PB1isPropFee,PB1.f_paytime_type as PB1paytimeType,PB1.f_cycle_type as PB1cycleType,PB1.f_bill_month_size as PB1billMonthSize,date_format(PB1.f_bill_month_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1billMonthStart,date_format(PB1.f_bill_month_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1billMonthEnd,date_format(PB1.f_pay_day_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1payDayStart,date_format(PB1.f_pay_day_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as PB1payDayEnd,PB1.f_hb_amount as PB1hbAmount,PB1.f_prefer_type as PB1preferType,PB1.t_bill_cycle_id as PB1tBillCycleId,PB1.t_group_building_bill_cycle_config_f_id as PB1tGroupBuildingBillCycleConfigFId,PB1.f_cash_status as PB1cashStatus,PB1.t_realroom_software_fee_f_id as PB1tRealroomSoftwareFeeFId,PB1.f_last_unpaid as PB1lastUnpaid,PB1.f_bank_collection_status as PB1bankCollectionStatus

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true
